name: The Spectacle Was Incredible~!
description:
The aliens are landing. The world will be destroyed. So, the last city on Earth is throwing the biggest party ever. How long can you make the party last?

A game jam game for the Wizard Jam, and my first game in Unity.

Enjoy~!

Controls:

  • Use the mouse to aim.
  • Press the Z, X, C keys to fire...

Use the firework explosions to create combo chains...
